New Records: Lockie Ferguson became just the second bowler to deliver four maidens in a T20I
Key Match Events: Charles Amini scored 17, the highest score of the innings
Trent Boult and Ish Sodhi picked up two wickets each
Post-Match Reflections: Lockie Ferguson in the record books
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kabua Morea returned 2 for 4 from 2.2 overs
Conditions were tough for batters with moisture in the pitch and variable bounce
